name: The Schrodinger's Trap
description:
Made for Dungeon Crwaler Jam 2023.

A short game, where you need to escape from Schrodinger's Box, hope you will like it.

I recomend to download game file, because i noticed that sometimes  web GL have problem running smoothly on chrome

MOVEMENT: WSAD

TURN LEFT/RIGHT: Q/E

SHOOT: LMB

TRANSITION BETWEEN REALITIES: SPACE

Font used from: dafont.com -  G7 Cube 5 by GSeven

Sounds used from: freesound.org
